DOC.detailed_description: In study Low intensity shockwaves ( 1/10 one use Lithotripsy ) deliver directly penile tissue use specially design shockwave device probe . Shock wave therapy apply twice week three week , 3- week interval therapy follow another 3 week period twice week shock wave therapy . Before sexual function questionnaire objective measure erectile function perform .
